tags.name: Virtual Bank Account APIs
tags.description: Use these APIs to manage VBA

tags.name: VBA Payment APIs
tags.description: Use these APIs fetch VBA payments

tags.name: VBA Notification APIs
tags.description: Use these APIs to manage notification groups

x-api-version.description: This header has the version of the API. The current version is 2022-09-01.

x-ratelimit-limit.description: Ratelimit set for your account for this API per minute

x-ratelimit-remaining.description: Contains number of seconds to wait if rate limit is breached

x-ratelimit-retry.description:
Contains number of seconds to wait if rate limit is breached
- Is 0 if withing the limit
- Is between 1 and 59 if breached

x-ratelimit-type.description:
either ip or app_id
- ip if making a call from the browser. True for api where you don't need x-client-id and x-client-secret
- app_id for authenticated api calls i.e using x-client-id and x-client-secret

x-request-id.description: Request id for your api call. Is blank or null if no x-request-id is sent during the request

x-idempotency-key.description: An idempotency key is a unique identifier you include with your API call. If the request fails or times out, you can safely retry it using the same key to avoid duplicate actions.

x-idempotency-replayed.description:
In conjunction with x-idempotency-key this means
- true if the response was replayed
- false if the response has not been replayed

post.description: Use this API to create a virtual bank account. It allows you to receive payments just like a regular bank account.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: client id generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-client-secret
parameters.description: client secret generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used. The accepted format is YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: x-request-id
parameters.description: Request id for the API call. Can be used to resolve tech issues. Communicate this in your tech related queries to Cashfree Payments.

virtual_account_details.description: It contains the details of the virtual bank account.

virtual_account_id.description: It is the unique ID you create to identify a virtual bank account. The parameter allows only alphanumeric characters.

virtual_account_name.description: It is the unique name you give to identify a virtual bank account. The parameter allows alphanumeric characters and whitespaces.

virtual_account_email.description: It is the email ID to associate with the virtual bank account.

virtual_account_phone.description: It is the phone number to associate with the virtual bank account.

kyc_details.description: It contains the KYC information of the virtual bank account holder.

gst.description: It is the GSTIN information to associate with the virtual bank account.

pan.description: It is the PAN information to associate with the virtual bank account.

aadhar.description: It is the aadhaar information to associate with the virtual bank account.

remitter_lock_details.description: It contains the bank account information of the remitter.

account_number.description: It is the bank account number of the remitter.

ifsc.description: It is the IFSC information associated with the bank account number.

amount_lock_details.description: It contains the details of the amount for the remittance.

min_amount.description: It is the minimum amount for the remittance.

max_amount.description: It is the maximum amount for the remittance.

bank_codes.description: It is the respective code used to create a virtual bank account in the corresponding bank. UTIB - Axis Bank ICIC - ICICI Bank YESB - Yes Bank Each bank code corresponds to a specific bank name.

notification_group.description: It is the group you created with the recipients to receive notificiations regarding the payment details. The parameter allows alphanumeric characters, hyphen (-), underscore

virtual_bank_accounts.description: It contains the details of the virtual bank account.

vba_bank_code.description: It displays the respective bank code you used to create the virtual bank account.

vba_account_number.description: It displays the account number of the virtual bank account.

vba_ifsc.description: It displays the IFSC information of the virtual bank account.

vba_status.description: It displays the status of the virtual bank account.

vba_created_on.description: It displays the creation date and time of the virtual bank account.

vba_last_updated_on.description: It displays the updation date and time of the virtual bank account.

virtual_account_details.description: It contains the details of the virtual bank account.

virtual_account_id.description: It displays the unique ID of the virtual bank account.

virtual_account_name.description: It displays the name of the virtual bank account.

virtual_account_email.description: It displays the email address associated with the virtual bank account.

virtual_account_phone.description: It displays the phone number associated with the virtual bank account.

kyc_details.description: It contains the KYC information of the virtual bank account holder.

gst.description: It is the GSTIN information to associate with the virtual bank account.

pan.description: It is the PAN information to associate with the virtual bank account.

aadhar.description: It is the aadhaar information to associate with the virtual bank account.

remitter_lock_details.description: It contains the bank account information of the remitter.

account_number.description: It is the bank account number of the remitter.

ifsc.description: It is the IFSC information associated with the bank account number.

amount_lock_details.description: It contains the details of the amount for the remittance.

min_amount.description: It is the minimum amount for the remittance.

max_amount.description: It is the maximum amount for the remittance.

message.example: bad URL, please check API documentation
order with same id is already present
Too many requests from IP. Check headers

post.description: Use this API to get all the payment details regarding a virtual bank account.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: client id generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-client-secret
parameters.description: client secret generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used. The accepted format is YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: x-request-id
parameters.description: Request id for the API call. Can be used to resolve tech issues. Communicate this in your tech related queries to Cashfree Payments.

start_range.description: It is the specific start date and time to retrieve the payment details associated with the virtual bank account. Allowed format - YYYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

end_range.description: It is the specific end date and time to retrieve the payment details associated with the virtual bank account. Allowed format - YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

status.description: It is the status of the payment.

virtual_account_id.description: It is the unique ID you created to identify the virtual bank account. The API retrieves all payment details with respect to this ID.

pagination.description: It contains parameters to mange and control the retrieval of paginated data.

cursor.description: It is the marker to a specific item in the dataset, facilitating navigation to subsequent pages of results.

limit.description: It is the maximum number of items to be included in each page of results.

virtual_account_id.description: It displays the unique ID you created to identify the virtual bank account.

utr.description: It displays the unique transaction reference (UTR) number generated by the remitter's bank to identify the payment transfer.

remitter_account.description: It displays the bank account number of the remitter account.

remitter_name.description: It displays the name of the remitter.

reference_id.description: It displays the unique ID created by Cashfree Payments for reference purposes.

credit_ref_number.description: It displays the unique number generated by Cashfree Payments' partner bank for reference purposes.

txtime.description: It displays the time of the transaction.

is_settled.description: It displays whether the transaction is settled.

txstatus.description: It displays the status of the transaction. The different statuses are SUCCESS, REJECTED, WAITING_FOR_PAYMENT, FAILED.

message.example: bad URL, please check API documentation
order with same id is already present
Too many requests from IP. Check headers

post.description: Use this API to create a notification group. The recipients in the group will receive notifications regarding the payment details.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: client id generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-client-secret
parameters.description: client secret generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used. The accepted format is YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: x-request-id
parameters.description: Request id for the API call. Can be used to resolve tech issues. Communicate this in your tech related queries to Cashfree Payments.

schema.description: PG VBA Notification Group Create Request

notification_group_name.description: It is the name you create to identify the notification group. The parameter allows alphanumeric characters, hyphen (-), and underscore ( _ ).

notification_group_emails.description: It is the email addresses of the recipients who receive the notifications.

notification_group_phone_numbers.description: It is the phone number of the recipients who receive the notifications.

notification_group_name.description: It displays the name of the created notification group.

notification_group_emails.description: It displays the email addresses of the recipients of the notification group.

notification_group_phone_numbers.description: It displays the phone numbers of the recipients of the notification group.

notification_group_created_on.description: It displays the time of the notification group created.

notification_group_last_updated_on.description: It displays time of the notification group updated.

message.example: bad URL, please check API documentation
order with same id is already present
Too many requests from IP. Check headers
